article_title: Chinese Businessman Among Feared Dead in French Helicopter Crash
article_text:
PARIS—A Chinese businessman who had purchased a large French vineyard was among four people feared dead after a helicopter taking him on a tour of his new purchase crashed into a nearby river.

Hong Kong-based businessman Lam Kok had just purchased the Château de la Rivière vineyard near Bordeaux, and was taking an aerial tour of the grounds in a...
